metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0128 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
vim is vulnerable to Out-of-bounds Read

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-0128` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

vim - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.9
vim-athena - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.9
vim-common - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.9
vim-gtk - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.9
vim-gtk3 - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.9
vim-gui-common - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.9
vim-nox - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.9
vim-runtime - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.9
vim-tiny - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.9
xxd - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.9
No subscription required

criterions.comment: vim package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.9').
